attributes.action: force TV companies to reduce reality TV shows.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are far too many reality TV shows on TV.  Things like Big Brother, I'm a celebrety, Survivor etc.  The TV compamies should be spending some of their income on producing good quality programming rather than taking the quick, cheap option of reality.

The NOVELTY has gone.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
